title: safety/clean package, incl: avg 8.0with serial, ad aware 2007+cr
description:
hello,

this is a package made to keep your pc clean

ths pack includes the next:



avg 8.0 with serial

ad aware 2007 + crack

spyhunter 3.4.9 with crack

kasersky 7.0.1 with a few keys

commodo firewall pro

spybot

malwarebytes anti-malware ( sorry couldnt find a crack for this one )

firefox 2

Ccleaner

ATF-Cleaner

GV-cleaner


notes:

with ad aware 2007 everytime you update you need to paste the cracks in the ad aware folder

kaspersky has some keys with only a few months on them, ill try to get some more and upload them then

do not install everything (only take kaspersky or avg, and install only spyhunter if u want an antispyware because spybot doesnt protect very good against spyware but can scan better)


the best option would be:

avg/kaspersky
ad aware2007
spyhunter (optional)
comodo
Ccleaner ( it works very good , i can delete 20+ mb crap each day )

i think that would be the best choice


i only added the rest for if u have troubles you can let them run to


note: gv_cleaner isfor uninstalling and deleting some software like spybot atf-cleaner and ad aware ( some other things to )


important!!!: dont install everything cause virus/spyware scanners dont work very good together :example: spybot will give a warning about spyhunter, but it is nothing
